title: China's Communist Party will signal its approach to the country's challenges at a meeting this week
content: While the meeting typically focuses on such long-term issues, business owners and investors will also be watching to see if the party announces any immediate measures to try to counter a prolonged real estate downturn and persistent malaise that has suppressed China's post-Covid-19 recovery.
summary: While the meeting typically focuses on such long-term issues, business owners and investors will also be watching to see if the party announces any immediate measures to try to counter a prolonged real estate downturn and persistent malaise that has suppressed China's post-Covid-19 recovery.

title: Renowned singer Mary Millben to perform US national anthem at Trump's GOP nomination ceremony
Shooter at Trump rally was 'quiet', 'lonely', and 'bullied' during school years: Report
content: Former classmates described Crooks as a "quiet" and "socially reserved" student who often seemed "lonely," as per a report in ABC News. A classmate of the shooter described him as appearing "socially reserved" and someone who "didn't have a ton of friends," but there were no recollections of him discussing politics or Trump. He was being bullied for his appearance and clothing choices, such as wearing hunting outfits, the ABC News report said.
summary: Former classmates described Crooks as a "quiet" and "socially reserved" student who often seemed "lonely," as per a report in ABC News. A classmate of the shooter described him as appearing "socially reserved" and someone who "didn't have a ton of friends," but there were no recollections of him discussing politics or Trump. He was being bullied for his appearance and clothing choices, such as wearing hunting outfits, the ABC News report said.

Eight female bodies recovered from Nairobi dump: Police
content: A total of eight bodies, all of them female, have been recovered so far from a dumpsite in a Nairobi slum, Kenya's acting police chief said on Sunday. Kanja took up his post only this week after the resignation of national police chief Japhet Koome in the wake of public fury over the deaths of dozens of protesters during anti-government demonstrations last month. txw/gv
summary: A total of eight bodies, all of them female, have been recovered so far from a dumpsite in a Nairobi slum, Kenya's acting police chief said on Sunday. Kanja took up his post only this week after the resignation of national police chief Japhet Koome in the wake of public fury over the deaths of dozens of protesters during anti-government demonstrations last month. txw/gv

title: As Gaza war rages, Palestinian culture stifled in Israel
content: Comedian Ayman Nahas said he has kept a "low profile" since October 7, fearing reprisals as an Arab artist in Israel while the country wages war in the Gaza Strip. He is one of many Arab artists in Israel or annexed east Jerusalem who describe facing increasing hostility and harassment, and fearing looming funding cuts or arrests.
summary: Comedian Ayman Nahas said he has kept a "low profile" since October 7, fearing reprisals as an Arab artist in Israel while the country wages war in the Gaza Strip. He is one of many Arab artists in Israel or annexed east Jerusalem who describe facing increasing hostility and harassment, and fearing looming funding cuts or arrests.

title: Is Biden behind Trump's assassination attempt? What Trump's potential running mates said
France's Bastille Day parade meets the Olympic torch relay in an exceptional year
content: Paris celebrated Bastille Day marking the 1789 Bastille storming. Macron reviewed military in a D-Day re-enactment. With 130,000 police, events featured French Foreign Legion, Marseillaise, and Concorde Plaza transformation. The Olympic torch relay included bicycle cadets and an equestrian gold medalist. Macron supported Ukraine amidst political turmoil, ensuring security for the high-profile upcoming Olympics.
summary: Paris celebrated Bastille Day marking the 1789 Bastille storming. Macron reviewed military in a D-Day re-enactment. With 130,000 police, events featured French Foreign Legion, Marseillaise, and Concorde Plaza transformation. The Olympic torch relay included bicycle cadets and an equestrian gold medalist. Macron supported Ukraine amidst political turmoil, ensuring security for the high-profile upcoming Olympics.

US based airlines bans employees to wear any badge over 'Hamas badges' row
content: Delta Airlines prohibits flight attendants from displaying any country flags on uniforms after controversy over Palestinian flag pins. Employee removed for violating company rules. CAIR captures deleted post. Delta issues apology and aims for a safe environment for all passengers.
summary: Delta Airlines prohibits flight attendants from displaying any country flags on uniforms after controversy over Palestinian flag pins. Employee removed for violating company rules. CAIR captures deleted post. Delta issues apology and aims for a safe environment for all passengers.

title: 'I love you dad': Ivanka's heartfelt note for dad after assassination attempt
content: Ivanka Trump thanked Secret Service and law enforcement after Donald Trump was shot in the ear at a rally in Butler, Pennsylvania. "Thank you for your love and prayers for my father and for the other victims of today's senseless violence in Butler, Pennsylvania. I am grateful to the Secret Service and all the other law enforcement officers for their quick and decisive actions today," Ivanka said. "I continue to pray for our country. I love you Dad, today and always," she added.
summary: Ivanka Trump thanked Secret Service and law enforcement after Donald Trump was shot in the ear at a rally in Butler, Pennsylvania. "Thank you for your love and prayers for my father and for the other victims of today's senseless violence in Butler, Pennsylvania. I am grateful to the Secret Service and all the other law enforcement officers for their quick and decisive actions today," Ivanka said. "I continue to pray for our country. I love you Dad, today and always," she added.
